post_install: if (-not $(test-path env:DICPATH) ) {            Write-Host -foreground magenta "NOTE: use the environment variable 'DICPATH' to point the dictionary storage location."            Write-Host -foreground magenta "NOTE: dictionaries are available at <http://downloads.sourceforge.net/wordlist/hunspell-en_US-2017.01.22.zip> and <https://sourceforge.net/projects/wordlist/files/speller/2017.01.22>."            }
